title: Multimedia Learning Strategy Workshop for Improving Middle School Science Textbook Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental instructional design theories and subject-matter expertise in science education
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course strengthening the integration of multimedia elements and visual materials based on existing textbook design experience

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to design science textbook layouts applying multimedia learning principles
Apply visual design principles (color, image placement, text-image integration, etc.) to actual textbook units
Produce digital textbook prototypes considering learner attention spans and incorporate peer feedback

resources: Adobe Illustrator or Canva Design Tools

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
